title: Integrated Energy Medicine
description: Integrated Energy Medicine workshops offer intensive and experiential training in the energy systems that underlie physical, mental, and emotional health.
cleaned_text: Integrated Energy Medicine Integrated Energy Medicine The Integrated Energy Medicine workshops offer intensive and experiential training in the subtle energy systems that underlie physical, mental, and emotional health. They are designed to help you better understand and work with the energy behind everything you create, in order to enrich your life and promote healing. If you already work with others in a healing capacity, these workshops can help you make your work more effective. They can also help you to discover and develop your own native approach to healing so that your work can be more powerful, precise, grounded, and natural. These workshops will provide tools and techniques to help you: Develop greater confidence, clarity, and grounding in your native healing abilities and intuitions. More easily perceive subtle energetic patterns and their organizing principles. Work with these subtle energetic patterns in practical ways to correct imbalance. Recognize the energetic underpinnings of most interactions, and relate with others more effectively. Understand clients' issues at deeper levels than you ever have before.
